direction.raw_text: Okay, spill it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is he? What does he do?    How do we know him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stan from the Farmer's Market? He's called twice already.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is he a farmer? Because that's not okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.   He makes cheese.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a pilgrim?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what he is. He's cute and different and plays the banjo. (then) I think I like him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the, you know, bun in the oven?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really doubt I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to be pregnant. You don't want to be pregnant. I'm confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to be pregnant. Of course I want to be pregnant. I mean, I put a lot of thought into this, right? (then) So what did Stan say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says to name any restaurant you want to go to. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll be there with bells on. (then) He didn't say the "bells on" part. I added that. Sounds a little too gay, though, so I take it back. EXT. 8TH STREET - NIGHT Zoe walks down 8th street. This is the first time we've seen her really pulled together, and she looks hot. She turns into the restaurant she's chosen for the big date. INT. GRAY'S PAPAYA HOT DOGS - NIGHT Zoe and Stan stand at the counter with an array of hot dogs in front of them. Stan looks at the hot dogs skeptically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We could have gone anywhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just take a bite.   You'll see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Per Se, Jean Georges, Nobu...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gray's Papaya.   Cheers. She clinks his dog and then they each take a bite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, right? Stan nods, covering his mouth because the bite is so big.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've lived here your whole life and never been to Gray's Papaya. What's wrong with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I actually haven't lived here my whole life. We moved out of the city when my parents bought the farm....not died, but actually bought a farm and moved upstate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That must have been a nice place to grow up. On a farm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about your family?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just me and my grandmother. She lives in a retirement community in Queens. (an awkward beat) My parents died when I was young.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry. There is a long silence.   They both stare at the hot dogs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what to say now.    I've made it all awkward and sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay. (then) My dad was kind of a bad guy, anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.   I'm so sorry, Zoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, come on, we'll get all this stuff out of the way so we never have to talk about it again. Let's ask all the awkward, get-to-know- you questions right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.   Good idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see...are you religious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope.   What about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever been married?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you sick of going to weddings?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I have to listen to one more couple write their own vows...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hate when they write their own vows! They clasp hands. Not in a high-fivey way, but in a connected, we have so much in common way. Their hands stay together, feeling the charge between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about kids? Zoe feels the blood rush to her cheeks.   Like everyone there must now be looking at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, do you want them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.   I want kids. She pulls her hand away. This has all gotten suddenly real. She looks at Stan, almost afraid to ask the next question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.   Absolutely. Zoe nods.   Slowly, she starts to breathe again. EXT. PERRY STREET - NIGHT They are now walking home together, arm-in-arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, first kiss...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jen Salzer. Seventh grade. She wore a head-gear. What about you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Summer camp. I think his name was-- Stan interrupts by kissing her. And it's a great kiss. Full of promises and answers. They linger there for a moment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was way better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When can I see you again? Zoe feels her heart jump.    She kisses him again. INT. ZOE'S APARTMENT - DAY Zoe is lying in bed with Nuts on the pillow next to her.    The sun is shining and they are both waking up. She gets up and goes to the mirror. She lifts up her nightgown and looks at her stomach, this time with a slight look of concern on her face. INT. EQUINOX - DAY Zoe and Mona are side-by-side on the elliptical machines. Zoe is going very fast, while Mona is barely moving at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if I'm pregnant?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then you'll get fat and hormonal and I'll say, "I told you so."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what if this could go somewhere with Stan? Like, really go somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then it will work out perfectly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because just when you really like him, you'll break up because you're pregnant and then you never have to put yourself out there and possibly get hurt. That's your dream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (thinks, then) I'm not pregnant. She gets off the machine. INT. EQUINOX STEAM ROOM - DAY We are in a foggy steam room with Zoe, Mona and a few other WOMEN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, when are you seeing him again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, don't have sex with him. That's the last thing we need. You get knocked up and we'll have no idea who the father is. A few women look over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then we'll have to do a paternity test. Is it the cheese farmer or the red-pubed bandit? More women look over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not going to have sex with him tonight. It's too soon. (for the women's benefit) I'm not a slut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, bring condoms, just in case. (thinks, then) And a pregnancy test.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very funny.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not joking. All of the women are now staring at Zoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm really not a slut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ZOE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT Zoe sits on the bed, holding a pregnancy test in her hands. Nuts is beside her. He looks up at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no way, right? INT. ZOE'S BATHEROOM - NIGHT Zoe pees on the stick.   Nuts is beside her, watching with his head tilted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop looking at me like that.   I'm not pregnant. Zoe finishes peeing and looks at the test.   Nothing yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come on, come on... We hear the doorbell RING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit. Zoe looks down at the test. Still nothing.      We wait and watch the test. The doorbell RINGS again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit! A faint PLUS SIGN is forming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shitshitshitshit... The plus sign then turns BRIGHT PINK. Zoe's heart stops. There it is. Plain as day. Pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, shit. Zoe stands.   Looks at herself in the mirror.   And then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy fucking shit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. TAXI - NIGHT Manhattan fades into the distance, as they drive over the Brooklyn Bridge. Zoe cracks the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you feeling okay? Zoe nods.   Her face looks pale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, because this should really be a culinary adventure. This is an underground restaurant that moves from apartment to apartment, depending on the chef. Zoe nods again. Hasn't heard a word he's said. She rolls the window all the way down and hangs her head out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And some of the guys from the band will be there. So, we might get a little jam going. Sounds fun, right? (then) Zoe? Zoe's POV. Headlights from passing cars whiz by, and the wind swirls her hair into her face. Brooklyn approaches like a bad dream. INT. UNDERGROUND RESTAURANT/SMALL APARTMENT - NIGHT Stan walks down a long table filled with appetizers. He is making a plate for each of them. Zoe trails behind, beads of sweat on her forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this looks like a mache salad with grapes and feta. He takes some for each of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this, oh this must be white beans and lamb's tongue. You've got to have some of this. Etienne is famous for his lamb's tongue. Olivia approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, stranger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hey, Olivia.   You remember Zoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. How'd that blueberry pie turn out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bought blueberries from me? Said you were going to make a pie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, can you excuse me for a second? Zoe hurries off.   Olivia watches her go.   Eyes narrowing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way she knows how to bake a pie. INT. UNDERGROUND RESTAURANT/SMALL APARTMENT - MOMENTS LATER Zoe hovers by the window, whispering into the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?!   Where are you? I'm on my way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Brooklyn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's that? Zoe hangs up the phone. INT. UNDERGROUND RESTAURANT/SMALL APARTMENT - MOMENTS LATER Zoe is now on the phone with Mona.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't panic. Could be a false positive. Take another test.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't. I'm at some underground foodie party in Brooklyn. Where am I gonna-- Out the window and across the street, we see a drugstore. INT. DRUGSTORE - NIGHT Zoe runs down the aisle and empties one, two, three...what the fuck, every pregnancy test into her basket. Her cell phone RINGS.    It's Bobby.   She picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I'm looking at a subway map. Which way is Brooklyn? She hangs up again. INT. UNDERGROUND RESTAURANT/SMALL APARTMENT - NIGHT Zoe hurries through the living room, a packed drugstore bag hidden under her arm. Stan comes up behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where have you been? Zoe jumps and accidentally drops the bag. The tests spill out onto the floor. She quickly scoops everything back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.   You scared me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you just go to the store?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I had a little emergency. I have a, a, um...corn, and I needed to get those little...corn pads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Corn pads?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, it's gross. Do you know where the bathroom is? Zoe walks off leaving him to ponder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's a corn pad? INT. BATHROOM - NIGHT Zoe pees on eight sticks at once.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Corn pad?    What the hell is wrong with you? Someone KNOCKS on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Corn pad.    Jesus Christ. The knocking turns to an angry BANGING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax! I'll be out in... (checks box) Three to five minutes. Zoe holds up the tests. One by one, the little windows all show PLUS SIGNS and CHECK MARKS and DOUBLE HASH MARKS. INT. UNDERGROUND RESTAURANT/SMALL APARTMENT - NIGHT Zoe exits the bathroom with a wide-eyed, terrified look on her face. By the bar, she sees a PREGNANT WOMAN sipping a glass of wine. She rushes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, are you allowed to drink when you're... Zoe makes hand motions at her belly, but can't say the word.

direction.raw_text: You know... More hand gestures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pregnant? (off Zoe's nod) My doctor says one glass is-- Zoe doesn't wait for her to finish. She rushes the bar, pours a glass of wine and downs it like a frat boy funneling a beer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Outside, we hear a banjo and guitar tuning up. EXT. BACK PATIO - SAME Stan, JERRY and SCOOTER are just starting to play. A small crowd gathers round. Stan starts to sing an old tune called "Sweet Little Miss Blue Eyes."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who makes me forget all the other girls I met, sweet, little Miss Blue Eyes. Who's sweeter to me, than she really ought to be, sweet little Miss Blue Eyes. Zoe appears at the door to the patio.   Stan smiles at her while he sings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's gonna start takin' care of my heart, she makes me realize. And it's lucky for me and I really want to be with... (winks at Zoe) sweet, little Miss-- Stan's POV as Zoe covers her mouth with two hands and bolts for the bathroom, puking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blue eyes? INT. BATHROOM - NIGHT Zoe's head is in the toilet. Just when we think she's done, she pukes again. Finally, she lifts her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ohhhhhhhh. She spies an unused pregnancy test on the floor.  One that must have dropped. Maybe this will be the one with the answer she's looking for. She sits back on the toilet, mustering up all of her focus to pee again. She closes her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, God... But she can't pee.   She tries and tries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Water, water everywhere, but not a drop to... She doubles over and pukes between her knees.   When she's done, she holds up the test. CU of the stick, which has no pee on it but is covered in vomit. Slowly the test reveals a PLUS SIGN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck me. EXT. PERRY STREET - NIGHT Stan and Zoe walk towards Zoe's brownstone. Stan is practically holding her up. Zoe stumbles along.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My singing made you vomit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.    It's not that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, we were a little out of tune, but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really don't feel well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it your corns?    Hurts to walk? ANGLE on Carol, from Single Mother's By Choice, approaching. Zoe's face pales.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow.   Hi.    Hey, there...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where have you been?    You haven't been coming to any--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cutting her off) Right. I know. I've been so busy. Next one, I'm there. For sure. (then, awkward) This is my friend, Stan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (eyeing Stan suspiciously) Hello. Are you two--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Late. Yes. We are. We really are. (pushing Stan along) I'll see you at the meeting. Bye. They walk on.   Stan looks at Zoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An old...boyfriend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her name is Carol. We're on a...committee together. They reach Zoe's front stoop.   Zoe peers over Stan's shoulder to make sure Carol's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. I have to go to bed now. I'll call you, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. (then) Hey, I was thinking, if you don't have any plans this weekend, maybe you'd like to come up to the farm and get away for a few days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll call you tomorrow. Something's not agreeing with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was it the lamb's tongue? Zoe runs inside holding her hand over her mouth.   Stan stands there for a beat. He calls after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, well...this weekend.   Think about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ZOE'S BEDROOM - NIGHT Zoe lies in bed. Nuts sleeps beside her. Zoe stares out the window at a flickering street lamp, her face full of fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell have I done? EXT. SHADYBROOK RETIREMENT COMMUNITY - DAY Establishing shot of a retirement compound in Queens. INT. SHADYBROOK LOBBY - DAY The lobby is well-appointed and cheery. A young STAFF works behind a front desk area. Were it not for a scattering of PEOPLE IN WHEELCHAIRS, you might think we were at a Ramada. Zoe walks by the front desk.   ANNIE, an employee, looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Zoe.   You look fantastic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how that's possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's different. Did you get highlights or a spray tan? Your face looks like it's...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please don't say glowing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!   Exactly! EXT. SHADYBROOK COURTYARD - LATER There is a small group of WOMEN speed walking around the courtyard. They are fully decked out in jogging suits, visors and nose shields. The ringleader is NANA, 83, fit and fabulous. On the sidelines is ARTHUR, 87, with his walker and big grin, as he watches the ladies exercise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Morning, Arthur.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, my dear! He struggles to get up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no, don't get up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good, because I can't get up. Came to see my lovely fiance? She's looking fine today, let me tell you. Fine. Nana rounds the bend and waves enthusiastically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Nana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One more mile to go. Do you have a minute? Talk to Arthur. Zoe looks at Arthur who's now watching Nana's ass, nodding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what I'm talking about. Work it. Horrified, Zoe quickly runs after Nana. EXT. SHADYBROOK COURTYARD - LATER Zoe is now speed walking with the ladies. She mimics the same strong arm movements and heel-toe foot action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want a nose guard?   I have an extra.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I'm fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure? Ethel Silverbeck just had another carcinoma removed from her nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Nana) I kind of need to talk to you. Alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Nana gives her friends a nod, and they fall back several paces. Zoe waits for them to be out of earshot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, they can't hear anything anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (can't hear her) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm pregnant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't hear you, darling.
